125853:

cause this might be the last time you hear my voice

because every tear you waste on me
isn't worth the air i breath, and every tear you waste on me


so let's make the best of what we've had
and would you care if i don't come back?
can you hear me scream your name?
hear me from a thousand miles away?
can you hear my scream your name?

this frame once held my favorite picture
and now it's empty, and now it's broken

hallowed out by your hands

this is for how you deserve

this should have ended with the kiss
that you left on someone else's lips
